revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Artila |model=Matrix 604 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=PloTech |manuf_model=11763-TB-6009 |est_release_date=05/2010 |type=industrial box computer |pwr_v=9-48 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=terminal block |cpu1_brand=Atmel |cpu1_model=AT91SAM9G20 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1G08U0C-SCB0 |fla2=2 |fla2_brand=Atmel |fla2_model=AT45DB161D |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3V56S40ETP-G6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=3 |serial=yes,, RJ45 console,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Davicom |eth_chip2_model=DM9161AEP |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Serial I2C RTC w/Battery Switchover;STMicroelectronics;M41T82;;1;,,, RS-232 Transciever;Sipex;SP3232EC;;1;,,, RS-232 Level Converter;Sipex;SP3243E;;4;,,, 3.3V RS-485/RS-422 Transceiver;SP3075E;;5;,,, High-Voltage 1A Step-Down Switching Regulator;National Semiconductor;LM5010;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Positive Voltage Regulator;Richteck;RT9164A;;1;,,, 400V Glass Passivated Bridge Rectifier;Multicomp Pro;DB104S;;1;,, |flags=RTC w/ battery, RS232, RS485, buzzer, metal case |stock_os=Windows;Embedded CE;6.0; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |oui_eth=00:13:48 }} {{TagLine|Artila MATRIX 604 Industrial WinCE Computer}} :[http://www.artila.com/docs/Matrix-604/Matrix-604_Datasheet.pdf Datasheet] "MATRIX 504 V03" silkscreened on top of board This is same hardware as [[Artila Matrix 504-64]] with different firmware ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Atmel]]'' AT91SAM9G20 @ 400 MHz *Memory: 64MB SDRAM *Onboard Storage: 2MB Serial Flash, 128MB NAND *Network: 1x FE *USB: 2x USB 2.0 Host, 1x USB Device *Serial: 2x RS232/RS485/RS422, 2x RS232/RS485 *Power: 9-48V via terminal block ==Images== File:Artila Matrix 504 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Artila Matrix 504 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
